typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(rownum as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(datalines = iif(!isNull(toInteger(left(toString(byPosition(1)),1))),toInteger(rownum),toInteger(0))) ~> Derivedcolumn1
Derivedcolumn1 aggregate(firstline = toInteger(minIf(datalines!=0,datalines))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['skiplines.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		firstline
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
